logic

Interface IArc


  • public interface IArc
    Interface for the class Arc, EmptyArc, ZeroArc
    Author:
    Yuyan Zhao

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getDirection()
      Get the direction.
      java.lang.String getId()
      Get the id of the arc/empty arc/zero arc.

      Get the place connected.

      Get the id of the source object.

      Get the id of the target object.

      Get the transition connected.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        java.lang.String getId()
        Get the id of the arc/empty arc/zero arc.
        Returns:
        id: id of the arc/empty arc/zero arc

      • getSourceId

        java.lang.String getSourceId()
        Get the id of the source object.
        Returns:

        Returns:

      • getTransition

        logic.Transition getTransition()
        Get the transition connected.
        Returns:
        transition

      • getWeight

        int getWeight()
        Get the weight. For EmptyArc, weight = nTokens of the connected place; for ZeroArc, weight = 0.
        Returns:
        weight

      • setWeight

        void setWeight(int w)
        Set the weight. For EmptyArc and ZeroArc, do nothing.
        Parameters:
        w: - weight

      • getDirection

        java.lang.String getDirection()
        Get the direction. For EmptyArc and ZeroArc, direction is p2t.
        Returns:
        direction

      • isFirable

        boolean isFirable()
        Check if it's firable.
        Returns:
        true or false
